abstract: American Airlines sues Google over the use of its trademarks in search advertising.
snippet: American Airlines sues Google over the use of its trademarks in search advertising.
lead_paragraph: Google and other search engines have been on the receiving end of a dozen or so lawsuits challenging a common practice in search advertising: the use of someone’s trademark, say Mercedes Benz, to show an ad for a competitor, say a BMW dealer. In that case, the BMW dealer would be buying ads tied to the search keyword “Mercedes Benz” from Google.
